name: NeoN Wave (SK7LL)
description:
NeoN Wave is a fast pace-shooter that you can play on your browser or windows.

It's all about top-down shooting. There are many game modes you can play.

There are 4 game modes to play:

Classic - Play and get the highest score. You can compete with your family member or play mate to get the highest score.

Apocalypse - Survive the apocalyptic Green eater's! until the end.

Crazy - All enemies combined together to fight you! Live or Die.

Can you survive the chaos?

Aim Trainer - Practice your aim in Top-Down mode. Just don't move so you can maintain your aim in all directions.

Current Version:  ( v 1.0 )

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Movements

Mouse -  Direction

Left Click - Fire

1  - Back

MADE BY CLOWN FISH CREATIONS
